name: DeleteZoomMeetingChatMessage
description:
Delete a live Zoom meeting chat message by ID.

Use this tool to delete a specific message in a live Zoom meeting. Ensure Zoom's DLP for in-meeting chats is enabled. Relevant scopes are required for authorization.

parameters.name: zoom_meeting_id
parameters.description: The unique identifier for the meeting. Store this value as a long-format integer since it can exceed 10 digits.

value_schema.description:
The meeting's ID. 

 When storing this value in your database, store it as a long-format integer and **not** an integer. Meeting IDs can be more than 10 digits.

parameters.name: chat_message_uuid_base64
parameters.description: The unique identifier for the live meeting chat message, encoded in base64 format.

value_schema.description: The live meeting chat message's unique identifier (UUID), in base64-encoded format.

parameters.name: chat_file_ids_base64
parameters.description: Base64-encoded IDs of live webinar chat files. Separate multiple values with commas.

value_schema.description: The live webinar chat file's universally unique identifier, in base64-encoded format. Separate multiple values with commas.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the Zoom API.

parameters.name: file_ids
parameters.description: The live webinar chat file's universally unique identifier, in base64-encoded format. Separate multiple values with commas.

value_schema.description: The live webinar chat file's universally unique identifier, in base64-encoded format. Separate multiple values with commas.

parameters.name: meetingId
parameters.description:
The meeting's ID. 

 When storing this value in your database, store it as a long-format integer and **not** an integer. Meeting IDs can be more than 10 digits.

value_schema.description:
The meeting's ID. 

 When storing this value in your database, store it as a long-format integer and **not** an integer. Meeting IDs can be more than 10 digits.

parameters.name: messageId
parameters.description: The live meeting chat message's unique identifier (UUID), in base64-encoded format.

value_schema.description: The live meeting chat message's unique identifier (UUID), in base64-encoded format.

secrets.description: The OAuth token to use for authentication.
